thread.title: Main Event Entertainment Introduces New Ways To Bring On The Fun To Texas This Fall
thread.title_full: Main Event Entertainment Introduces New Ways To Bring On The Fun To Texas This Fall - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Main Event Entertainment Introduces New Ways To Bring On The Fun To Texas This Fall
text:
Main Event Entertainment
'FUNbination' lets guests customize their favorite Main Event activity for only $7 per activity
DALLAS , Sept. 9, Main Event Entertainment , the fastest-growing bowling-anchored entertainment center in America, offers guests the opportunity to combine their favorite activities now through Nov. 6 with FUNbination. Guests can choose unlimited bowling, billiards, laser tag and more for only $7 per person, per activity, at any Main Event Entertainment location including centers in Dallas ( Frisco , Grapevine , Lewisville and Plano ), Fort Worth , Houston ( Katy , Shenandoah, Stafford and Webster ), Lubbock , San Antonio , Austin and Pharr .
FUNbination is available all day Tuesday through Friday, and from open to 4 p.m. Monday . The offer also includes mini golf, gravity ropes and rock climbing where available.
"Main Event's FUNbination is a unique way for guests to customize their FUN with all of their favorite Main Event activities," said Main Event Vice President of Marketing Sherri Landry . "Whether it's bowling a perfect game on one of our state-of-the-art lanes, racking 'em up on our regulation-sized billiard tables, or racing through a two-story laser tag adventure, our guests can play and have unforgettable fun together for a great price."
Fall also marks the start of Main Event's Fall FUNleagues. From Sept. 27 through Nov. 18 , families and friends can have a fun, social night of team bowling. FUNleague play is only $8 per person per week, and guests who prepay by Sept. 13 will receive a free bowling ball. Online registration and team schedules for Sunday through Wednesday league play are available at mainevent.com.
Even more fall fun is available every Monday from 4 p.m. to close during Monday Night Madness. Guests can choose from three offers including all-you-can-play activities such as bowling, billiards or laser tag, unlimited video game play or a $20 FUNcard, valid for food and fun, for $9.95 each.
Main Event's unique "Eat.Bowl.Play." experience includes dining options featuring a chef-inspired menu, specialty pizzas, a full bar serving innovative cocktails, wines, craft and local beers, and catering options for corporate and group events.
Main Event currently operates 14 entertainment centers in Texas , in addition to centers in Oklahoma , Arizona , Georgia and Illinois . It will open a flagship location in Fort Worth in 2016.
About Main Event Entertainment
Dallas -based Main Event Entertainment is a top destination for people ready to play! Its unique Eat.Bowl.Play. experience features state-of-the-art bowling, multi-level laser tag, high ropes adventure courses, billiards and interactive and virtual video games, with dining experiences ranging from fast casual to fine dining and creative cocktails, beer and wine. Founded in 1998, the rapidly growing subsidiary of Ardent Leisure Group (ASX: AAD) of Australia turns ordinary days into memories at 20 U.S. family entertainment centers. In Texas Main Event Entertainment operates in Dallas ( Frisco , Grapevine , Lewisville and Plano ), Fort Worth , Houston ( Katy , Shenandoah, Stafford and Webster ), Lubbock , San Antonio , Austin and Pharr . Corporations, individuals and families consistently rank the centers "Best Place to Bowl" and "Best Party Place." For more information, visit mainevent.com .
